titleStmt.title: The benefit of contentation Taken by characterie and examined after.

titleStmt.author: Smith, Henry, 1550?-1591.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Roger Ward, for Iohn Proctor, and are to be solde at his shop vppon Holborne bridge,
